text: Cynthia "Cindy" Adams (n√©e Sugar; later Heller; born April 24, 1930) is an American gossip columnist and writer. She is the widow of comedian/humorist Joey Adams. She was born in New York City. She began to work as a photographer's model in Manhattan. Since 1979, Adams has written a gossip column for the New York Post, a New York City newspaper. She also contributed to Sunday Today in New York. Adams became a syndicated newspaper columnist in 1981. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American activists Category:Models from New York City Category:Journalists from New York City
title: Cindy Adams
